message.body: Who taught your psych class last semester?
Ben le. Theory and research in dyadic processes formerly known as close relationships. I took social psych and lab with him too.
Is he cool? I'm looking up people I could someday (or sooner) want to do research for over the summer, his research seems really cool....

Yeah I do research with him now! I really like him. Take his class :) his research is on romantic relationships and the investment model (satisfaction, low quality alternatives, and investments predict commitment predicts stability and a whole host of things). We can talk about it if you want!
Yeah I've been reading some of the stuff about him on the Haverford website and his CV an stuff... I'm really interested in everything I've read so far.
I definitely want to talk to you about this!
Did you know that Boltz is a member of the International Society for the Study of Time? Why is that a thing?!
Haha nope :) okay we can talk
